text_en: â€œWe need a computer which is well facilitated with Jaws program.
That program aids us to get to know what we have written by voice.
We ask for a sighted person who will be able to read it using a screen.
Not only when knowing what we have written, but in case if I want to read a file document.
It is that program that assist me how to get it or how to read it for myself without consulting any other person to come and help me.
